programme.desc: 23/25. Series following the work of probate researchers. The heir hunters search for relatives of Red Cross nurse and hairdresser Ivy Hudson, who died at the ripe old age of 103.
programme.title: Heir Hunters

programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a house in Derby, a property in Gravesend, and a picturesque cottage in Dorset, and find out how much they sold for at auction. [S] Then BBC News; Weather.
programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer

programme.desc: Clive Holland has help for those who have fallen victim to cowboy builders. His team visits two Preston women on the same street whose homes were blighted by the same builder.
programme.title: Cowboy Trap

programme.desc: 8/10. Two siblings explain how their late mother was conned by rogue driveway installers. Also in HD. [S] Then BBC News; Weather.
